name: Paul Hilgendorf
text:
It's a small pizza joint with a nice buffet providing a good selection of pizza. Included is a salad bar and pasta.
The price was pretty good, and it was clean.

name: Tiffani Dyer
text: It's my first time tonight... I ate the Buffet!! The Salad bar was missing the olives and eggs... other than that...The Salad Bar was great!!!...The Pizza...The sauce on the pizza was excellent!! Bar Q pizza, Taco Pizza and Pepperoni Pizza â€¦More

name: charle Tim
text: I love the pizza here. The staff was very friendly and I never left wanting more

name: Tammie Wall
text: They have a buffet that has a good selection of pizzas, pasta, and salad. The service is always friendly. We love their cheeseburger pizza and chicken bacon pizza.  They take request for pizzas to put on the buffet. Overall,  this is a good place to get good food quickly at a decent price.

name: Rick Phillips
text: Pizza in is the very first place where I ever ate pizza, I think I was about eight years old the first time we went here. When I was in college, we would come here every Monday night after our fraternity meeting, and have some of their â€¦More

name: Ethan Jackson
text: Fast , in and out, what a buffet. Pizza is 3.9/5, some not as flavorful. Enjoyed the taco pizza the best and dessert pizza. If you want gr8 food and a 10$ buffet deal. Go here

name: Trevor Williams
text: Best pizza buffet this side of town. Of course it's buffet quality, but it's just fine and the section is pretty dang good. Always very clean and a great friendly staff.

name: Dustin Goad
text: It's great for what it is. Good prices for a lot of decent pizza. Just don't set your expectations too high. This isn't local, high quality pizza.

name: Richard Gann
text: afternoonI was in a "not so good mood" last Friday but was hungry.  Remembering I did not bring my lunch from home I had two choices. To starve, or snap out of this Friday funk. I frequent Pizza Inn on a regular basis and have done so since â€¦More

name: Shelby Sisk
text: I love it and would recommend it to anyone will be going back In the Future

name: Andrea Johnson
text: Always great pizza. Nice staff. Economically priced. Family friendly.

name: Chris Alan Wall
text: Pizza inn has a buffet and when I asked for a special pizza they made one fresh just doe me. They also have great service.

name: Juan Alvarado
text: The lunch buffet at this place is exactly what you need in your life if you're starving or just love good pizza.

name: Tag Master
text: Could have been fresher/hotter. also seemed that crust was a little thick. Over all i like the crust more thin and crispy. salad was good. olives and other garnish was average

name: Vickie Odom
text: I loved this place the food was always fresh and gd was do sad when it shut down

name: Jared Hanson
text: Awful, food is poor quality and the silverware and plates were dirty and old food stuck to it. No manager at the restaurant to talk to about these issues.

name: Charles Buckley
text: Good pizzas and good service

name: Tim Winstead
text: 1:00 pm, hard to get anything fresh.

name: Mark Rodriguez
text: Good pizza buffet at a great price!

name: Rick Haines
text: Good buffet at reasonable price.

name: Coop R
text: The food was great and it was very clean.

name: Tyler Koehn
text: The quality of service has greatly improved over the last few months. Original, only two stars. The buffet is usually fully stocked, despite the huge lunch crowds.

name: chemtrooper
text: The buffet is amazing!  You can tell that the employees care about their business, exceptionally clean, orderly and always courteous.   6 stars!

name: Daniel Caleb
text: Love the food and the staff

name: Noel Hughes
text: The staff always has a smile on there faces and are very pleasant to be around.

name: Nathan Aaron
text: Good pizza, need better atmosphere

name: tanner baker
text: Went once on a whim, was pretty impressed.  Wait staff was courteous.  Like stated earlier, it's not artisan pizza, but that's not what they promote.

name: Keith Brown
text: Food is Ok, but I prefer a thicker crust.

name: Dustin Wayne
text: Great service clean nice place to go with the family! And to top all that off the pizza was good!ðŸ˜€

name: Jon N/A
text: Always hot, fresh pizza. Will take requests for buffet. Staff is friendly and my cup usually doesn't get empty.

name: Toni Hitner
text: Great service and good food.

name: Doug Farnsworth
text: Freindly staff excellent food and most of all they kept my tea glass full and with me thats a BIG plus

name: Nicole Dunlap
text: Outstanding friendly service with amazing hot pizzas, the greatest desserts and an amazing salad bar. Low prices

name: okie toys
text: Staf was great,  pizza was eh ok

name: John Gay
text: Great service. Fresh Buffett

name: kathy vasquez
text: Good pizza for the price

name: Brandon Ratcliff
text: Omg best pizza in a while friendly staff. Love the candy machines there as well.

name: Steve Samples
text: Attentive wait staff despite being slammed by a busload of kids. Clean. OK food

name: Darksilverjesse
text: For around $10 all you can eat pizza, good music, friendly workers.

name: Debbie Hart
text: The buffet had good variety and was restocked regularly.   Love the table service and being given a to-go drink as we left.

name: Anna Burris
text: Good buffet w pizza & salads. Reasonable prices.

name: Rick Haines
text: They have really good pizza, just a little pricey

name: Glenda Jordan
text: Delicious and friendly staff today

name: Glerg Turkle
text: Really enjoyed ourselves. If you ask, they'll make you a pizza and stick it on the buffet.

name: James Scouten
text: The sauce was a little bit spicier than I'm used to on pizza but good still.

name: Shirleyn Law
text: First time eating here at the Pizza Inn, was awesome employees were all very friendly and helpful letting us know about the specials they have as well as the time of their buffet menu

name: Carrie Haslacker
text: Good food, great service

name: camey
text: Usually go to ponca city to eat at pizza inn. But was in enid so stopped in. This place was very small. But they kept the pizza coming out fast and fresh.

name: John Culler
text: Great food only place in town to get cheeseburger pizza

name: Cory H
text: Comparable to pizza street or Cici's pizza not frozen pizza bad not over the top either

name: Mike Moler
text: Good food, good service.  Good dining experience.

name: Adam Robertson
text: Good quality great price friendly staff, wide variety. They will make any combination you want!

name: Edward Chandler
text: I thought it was very good and they will make a pizza if you don't see one you like. We will be going back for sure.

name: Leo Dance
text: This is my favorite pizza place to eat at. Great food and service.

name: Carl Oldridge
text: It was nice, not quite, but nice. Pizza made to order.

name: Jerry Meyer Jr
text: Good pizza average salad bar wrong location  fair prices no beer selection

name: Larry Smith
text: Went in after 2 the place had about 10 people in there eating still there was pleanty of pizza on the buffet and they turned us away because the little guy in the back is lazy and didnt want to cook what kind of place turnes away paying â€¦More

name: Barbara Hoskins-reyes
text: It was friendly but you don't know the price til you leave would be good to have the price on the Web site for buffet

name: J Anonymous
text: This is a small building with a buffet but the staff is just great here the food is decent it's a chain restaurant it's kind of cheap you definitely get what you pay for here which is nice not fancy not bad

name: Clayton Krehbiel
text: About as good as I could expect.

name: Roger Howton
text: Good food good people

name: lucien casey
text: It's a pizza buffet.  The food anf service was good, however this place was easily not the best pizza inn we have eaten at.

name: M Atkinson
text: Decent buffet, decent price

name: Jeni Martin
text: Nice waitress but the pizza & pasta was substandard...and no beer!?

name: Leeann Miller
text: Pizza was great. Service was wonderful.

name: Pedro Perez
text: Awesome service and wonder food

name: Pointy Sticks
text: It was ok food but in my opinion it is just a revamped cici's pizza.

name: Ron Parnell
text: Great pizza good to have pizza inn back in Enid

name: Lou Weidner
text: Pizza was hot and a lot off different choices workers very friendly

name: Dylan Davis
text: Good staff really cold and really old tasting food, and it was not worth what we paid for it.

name: Kyle Rodgers
text: Good place to eat

name: Bob Rob
text: Buffet yields food poisoning..not often i Would recommend sandwiches at a pizza place...but they are the safer option here

name: Evan Wilson
text: Had to leave early due to seeing a roach in the salad bar and on a pizza.

name: Mysti Stevison
text: Yummy

name: Carrie H
text: Excellent Salad bar and Pizza

name: Phyllis Morgaridge
text: The very best pizza and the friendless workers

name: Destiny Teubert
text: Horrible quality. People were rude and the service was the worst

name: Karen Bowling
text: Fresh,hot and delicious pizza

name: Janet Henigman
text: Pizza a bit cool on buffet

name: Rhema Abercrombie
text: Good pizza!

name: Billie
text: Eh

text: Great Pizza

name: elizabeth johnson
text: No

name: Gary Lewis
text: Ok

name: robert mollett
text: Bets cici's pizza

name: Margaret Whitfield
text: I don't like the place, but my daughter does, and she would rated at 5 but I rated A one start.

name: Leslie Krannawitter
text: Good food

name: Stephanie Hurst
text: Yes they have buffet on weekends

name: Honorio Rojas
text: Pizza is really good.

name: Dave Mikesell
text: good food

name: andrew
text: Fair food but they don't like request for different pizza on buffet and the wait staff do more time talking and being real loud and not very clean wait staff.unproffesional wait staff and cook

name: Angela Sanchez-Montanez
text: Just for 2 people I paid 18.00

name: Leo Dance
text: Great pizza and spaghetti

name: Meggles Crump
text: I worked here and pizza is on point!

name: Thelma Chesnut
text: Good pizza and salad bar!!

name: Karen Nance
text: There is very little non pork pizzas on buffet. Priced to high.

name: djghettoredneck
text: New place, bad eats.

name: Alexis Alex Annis
text: It was really bad
